snippet: SCOTT--Sandra. The Legal Aid Family mourns the loss of our beloved colleague and officer. Her courage, integrity and dedication will serve as her legacy. We will miss her warm spirit and commitment to excellence. We offer our condolences to her hu...
lead_paragraph: SCOTT--Sandra. The Legal Aid Family mourns the loss of our beloved colleague and officer. Her courage, integrity and dedication will serve as her legacy. We will miss her warm spirit and commitment to excellence. We offer our condolences to her husband and family. 1/3
